content:
There will be a workshop on Category Theory for Cognitive Science at the Cognitive Science Society's 2022 meeting in Toronto this July 27. The target audience is cognitive scientists. If you know anyone from that background looking for an introduction please help spread the word. Faculty include Steven Phillips, Geoffrey Crutwell, and Toby St Clere Smithe. Anyone interested can reach out to me for more information.

The workshop description is under tutorial 4
This is interesting, and I guess that https://arxiv.org/abs/2201.01136 would be in scope. Unfortunately Toronto isn't exactly around the corner...
